A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie as a die hard fan who has watched the originals from a baby with her Dad. Even my husband was blown away and he is not a fan of nerdy\, sci-fi\, space operas- whatever you want to call a Star Wars film. There was so much love and attention to detail and they took a huge risk- which paid off! I cannot wait to see this again! It was not a perfect film\, but I wonder what could be perfect for all fans. Clearly there is a huge disconnect there with the swarm of bad ones. All I know is that myself\, my friends and my dad loved it. Amazing job Rian and the whole cast and crew!
